snippet: After the International Olympic Committee voted to drop the sport in 2020, its global federation has made wide-ranging changes in an effort to be reinstated.
lead_paragraph: After the International Olympic Committee voted to drop the sport in 2020, its global federation has made wide-ranging changes in an effort to be reinstated.

headline.main: Overhaul for Wrestling in Bid to Stay in Olympics
headline.print_headline: Changing Wrestling to Keep It in Games
